title: Controlling Your Weaknesses | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Controlling Your Weaknesses | Joel Osteen
description:
We have to learn to deal with our weaknesses in the correct way. Don't let anything keep you from the blessings God has prepared for you!

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
